root.Summary: 1: Capela de Matos RR, De Figueiredo AF, Liehr T, Alhourani E, De Souza MT,Binato R, Ribeiro RC, Silva ML. A Novel Three-Way Variant t(8;13;21)(q22;q33;q22)in a Child with Acute Myeloid Leukemia with RUNX1/RUNX1T1 : The Contribution ofMolecular Approaches for Revealing t(8;21) Variants. Acta Haematol. 2015 Jun26;134(4):243-245. [Epub ahead of print] PubMed PMID: 26138995.
